workouts.name: Pizza margarita
tips: Try to do the 9 and 6 thrusters unbroken
instructions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in buttermilk until dough is smooth. Drop by spoonfuls onto a greased baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes, until bottoms are golden brown and biscuits are cooked through.

workouts.name: Broken biscuit squares
tips: Try to do the 9 and 6 thrusters unbroken
instructions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in buttermilk until dough is smooth. Drop by spoonfuls onto a greased baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes, until bottoms are golden brown and biscuits are cooked through.

workouts.name: Pasta with tomato sauce
tips: Try to do the 9 and 6 thrusters unbroken
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute more. Add the tomatoes and their juices, crushing them in your hands as you add them to the pot, and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer, covered, for 1 hour or until thickened. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Stir in the basil and remove from the heat. Serve warm.
